body: I got a new computer and the person who installed windows 10 gave me 32 bit and proceeded to loose the activation key. I bought windows again on Kinguin and I'm looking for help on what steps I need to do to upgrade. ThanKs!
body_tagged: I got a new computer and the person who installed windows 10 gave me 32 bit and proceeded to loose the activation key. I bought windows again on Kinguin and I'm looking for help on what steps I need to do to upgrade. ThanKs!
title: Windows 32bit to 64bit.

replies.body: Get a win10 64bit install disc or USB stick, install the OS on your computer, activate it with the key.
replies.body_tagged: Get a win10 64bit install disc or USB stick, install the OS on your computer, activate it with the key.

replies.body: Actually u can have a free version without buying a kid but ya just do wat he said ^^^
replies.body_tagged: Actually u can have a free version without buying a kid but ya just do wat he said ^^^

replies.body: I'm pretty sure you stick the usb or disc in while the computer is off and then turn your computer on, it should send you to some BIOS-looking thing. After that idk :/
